DocumentationÔÉÅ

The left sidebar contains links to the documentation of the main modules of this package as well as two examples:

  1. How to combine Entropy Pooling views / stress-tests with CVaR optimization.

  2. A replication of the results from Vorobets [2021] for the original Entropy Pooling method.

The data used in all of the example is the simulation from Vorobets [2021]. You can load this data using the load_pnl() function.
